item.title: Calling All Experienced Mom UGC Content Creators! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a creative and energetic mom with a passion for making engaging content? We are looking for someone just like you to create fun and interactive videos for our children's app, featuring interactive cartoons and games designed for kids (2-6 years).

What We're Looking For:

An experienced Mom UGC content creator with a knack for creating authentic and relatable content for other moms.
Someone who is energetic, fun, and playful, and knows how to connect with an audience.
Experience in video editing is a plus.
Perks:
We provide a monthly subscription to our app so you can explore all its features and create the best content possible.

How to Apply:
To help us evaluate your application quickly, please submit samples of your past UGC work. We look forward to seeing your creativity in action!



Budget: $100
Posted On: June 25, 2024 09:07 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Short Video Ad, UGC
Skills: Short Video Ad, UGC
Country: Cyprus

item.title: Video Reviewer - Test and Evaluate Online Websites in Make Money Category - Upwork
item.description:
Do you have a keen eye for detail and love uncovering the truth? Are you comfortable on camera? We're looking for a video reviewer in the US to join our team and create informative reviews of online and offline earning platforms.

In this role, you'll:

- Sign up for popular platforms like Swagbucks, User Interviews, Instacart and more to test your detective skills.
- Earn real money by completing surveys, following instructions on microtask platforms, and trying out gig economy jobs (keep these earnings – they're yours!)
- Test the app for around 5 hours
- Document your experience: record yourself cashing out and completing tasks.
- Become a star! Create engaging video reviews which will be edited by professional video editor (no prior video experience needed, we'll provide training!)

Why You'll Love Working Here:

- Flexible hours: work whenever you want, wherever you want as long as it's in USA.
- Competitive pay: earn $75 per video review (expenses covered if any), plus keep your earnings from the app that you have tested (up to $15 extra per hour!)
- Be a part of something bigger: your reviews help others make informed decisions online.
- Focus on your performance, not editing: Don't worry about perfecting your video editing skills - our team will handle the post-production magic!

Ready to join the team?

If you're a detail-oriented individual with a passion for sharing your discoveries, we want to hear from you! Apply today!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 25, 2024 08:44 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Skills: Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.description:
**Overview:**
Seeking a creative TikTok Ads Creator to produce viral video content promoting health and beauty products from our Shopify store.

I Will Pay $5 Per AD video

**Responsibilities:**
- Create engaging TikTok ads aligning with our brand.
- Use current trends to maximize engagement.
- Edit and optimize videos for TikTok.
- Conduct A/B testing for ad effectiveness.
- Collaborate with marketing to align strategies.

**Requirements:**
- Proven success with TikTok ads, ideally in health and beauty.
- Strong video editing skills.
- Ability to leverage TikTok trends.
- Creative with attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and timely delivery.

**Apply:**
Submit your portfolio of TikTok ads and a brief overview of your approach to creating viral content, including performance metrics.

item.title: Product Review Video Creator (Amazon Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 25, 2024 08:36 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Meta ad/organic video editor for pet product - ongoing work - Upwork
item.description:
Summary:
- Australian health monitoring cat litter brand needing a video editor to assist in consistent meta organic/ad videos.
- 1-2 days a week work consistently
- MUST HAVE PROOF OF PREVIOUS HIGH PERFORMING VIDEOS (VIEWS/ENGAGEMENT) ON APPLICATION
- Refer to https://www.instagram.com/lucentglobe/?hl=en for type of videos we want to do.

About Fit Litter:
Fit Litter is dedicated to providing innovative solutions for cat health and wellness. Our mission is to make cat ownership easier and more enjoyable through products that monitor and enhance pet health. We are looking to expand our social media presence and need a skilled video editor to join our team.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and proactive Freelance Video Editor to create engaging and high-performing videos for our Facebook and Instagram platforms. The ideal candidate will have experience in editing videos for social media, with a strong portfolio of successful videos that have garnered high views and engagement. You will be working with a lot of person-in-front-of-camera content, similar to the style of Lucent Globe.

Responsibilities:

Edit and produce high-quality videos for Facebook and Instagram, including both organic content and ads.
Collaborate with the marketing team to understand the message and goals for each video.
Use your editing skills to enhance the storytelling and make videos more engaging.
Incorporate basic animations, text overlays, and transitions as needed.
Ensure videos are optimized for each platform’s specifications and best practices.
Provide proof of high-performing videos, including metrics on views and engagement.
Think proactively about how to improve video engagement and suggest creative ideas.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a video editor, specifically for social media platforms.
Strong portfolio demonstrating high-performing videos with significant views and engagement.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar).
Ability to work with person-in-front-of-camera shots and create compelling narratives.
Knowledge of social media video formats, trends, and best practices.
Excellent attention to detail and creativity.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$50.00

item.ns0:encoded:
Summary:
- Australian health monitoring cat litter brand needing a video editor to assist in consistent meta organic/ad videos.
- 1-2 days a week work consistently
- MUST HAVE PROOF OF PREVIOUS HIGH PERFORMING VIDEOS (VIEWS/ENGAGEMENT) ON APPLICATION
- Refer to https://www.instagram.com/lucentglobe/?hl=en for type of videos we want to do.

About Fit Litter:
Fit Litter is dedicated to providing innovative solutions for cat health and wellness. Our mission is to make cat ownership easier and more enjoyable through products that monitor and enhance pet health. We are looking to expand our social media presence and need a skilled video editor to join our team.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and proactive Freelance Video Editor to create engaging and high-performing videos for our Facebook and Instagram platforms. The ideal candidate will have experience in editing videos for social media, with a strong portfolio of successful videos that have garnered high views and engagement. You will be working with a lot of person-in-front-of-camera content, similar to the style of Lucent Globe.

Responsibilities:

Edit and produce high-quality videos for Facebook and Instagram, including both organic content and ads.
Collaborate with the marketing team to understand the message and goals for each video.
Use your editing skills to enhance the storytelling and make videos more engaging.
Incorporate basic animations, text overlays, and transitions as needed.
Ensure videos are optimized for each platform’s specifications and best practices.
Provide proof of high-performing videos, including metrics on views and engagement.
Think proactively about how to improve video engagement and suggest creative ideas.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a video editor, specifically for social media platforms.
Strong portfolio demonstrating high-performing videos with significant views and engagement.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar).
Ability to work with person-in-front-of-camera shots and create compelling narratives.
Knowledge of social media video formats, trends, and best practices.
Excellent attention to detail and creativity.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 08:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing
